description: Based on Double RL chino pants. Made from 6.7 oz. cotton twill and garment-dyed. Hand-sanded for a distressed finish. Decorative stitching at the side on-seam pockets. Corozo buttons.
fitting_details: All sizes have an 8½" inseam. Size 32W has an 12¼" rise.
Belt loops. Button fly with a buttoned closure. Corozo buttons.
Side on-seam pockets. Right hip coin pocket. Two back buttoned pockets.
